items.sentence: Tom and Mary enjoyed a romantic evening by the fireplace.
In the future, I think there'll be a subway station here.
I don't enjoy studying because I don't make any progress.
I think, without a doubt, that I'll win the tennis match.
I heard that you became the manager of the Boston branch.
Tom pulled a flashlight out of his pack and turned it on.
As far as I'm concerned, I have no objection to the plan.
I'm not sure yet if I'll go to a university or get a job.
Just because I'm a wolf, everyone thinks I'm the bad guy.
I wonder whether Tom thinks Mary wants to do that or not.
I had no idea how much artistry could go into a sandwich.
How many kilometers is it from here to the train station?
Let's hope the same thing doesn't happen again this year.
You knew Tom didn't plan on joining the team, didn't you?
That was the tiniest cockroach I've ever seen in my life.
By the time I got home, the children were already asleep.
Usually anger makes me cry and crying makes me feel good.
I'm not feeling well and would prefer to stay home today.
What's the difference between a magazine and a newspaper?
Because of the storm, the ship couldn't leave the harbor.
